hadiths.text: Suwaid b. Ghafala reported:I saw Umar (Allah be pleased with him) kissing the Stone and clinging to it and saying: I saw Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) having great love for you

chapter.ara-name: باب اسْتِحْبَابِ تَقْبِيلِ الْحَجَرِ الأَسْوَدِ فِي الطَّوَافِ
chapter.eng-name: It is recommended to kiss the black stone during circumambulation (Tawaf)
